articles.author: Newsweek
articles.title: Trump Ally Issues New Warning to Senators After Kash Patel Nomination
articles.description: Conservative lawyer Mike Davis warned that Senate Republicans who oppose Patel would face a "living hell."
articles.content:
Conservative lawyer Mike Davis is warning Senate Republicans that they will feel his "political wrath" if they dare to block the confirmation of Kash Patel, President-elect Donald Trump's nominee for FBI director.

articles.title: Musk, Vivek face target-rich environment for wacky regs and waste
articles.description: Elon Musk and his Department of Government Efficiency partner Vivek Ramaswamy are compiling a list of Uncle Sam’s biggest boondoggles for Donald Trump.
articles.content:
Elon Musk promises that his new Department of Government Efficiency can reveal how to cut federal spending by $2 trillion per year.
Musk and his DOGE partner Vivek Ramaswamy are compiling a list of Uncle Sam’s biggest boondoggles to send to the Trump... [4425 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Whirlwind of Controversies: From Hunter's Pardon to Abortion Laws
articles.description: The White House defended President Biden's pardon of Hunter amid bipartisan criticism. A US appeals court partly revived Idaho's abortion trafficking law. Congress returns to handle pressing issues before Trump's presidency. Art Cashin, a CNBC regular, passes away at 83. And, California gears up for legal clashes with Trump's administration.
articles.content: The White House is standing firm on President Joe Biden's decision to pardon his son, Hunter Biden, amid heavy criticism from both Democrats and Republicans. Officials assert that the pardon was partly to shield Hunter from future political persecuti... [487 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: California's Legislative Showdown: State Prepares for Possible Trump 2.0 Challenges
articles.description: California Governor Gavin Newsom and lawmakers began a special session to protect state policies ahead of a possible Trump presidency. With supermajorities in both legislative chambers, Democrats prepared for federal challenges with proposed legal funds and new legislation to safeguard civil rights, immigration, and climate policies.
articles.content: Governor Gavin Newsom and California's state lawmakers reconvened Monday for a special session aimed at fortifying the state's progressive policies against potential actions of another Trump presidency. The session signifies California's strategic re... [721 chars]

articles.author: Sky News
articles.title: Donald Trump nominates billionaire investment banker Warren Stephens to be US ambassador to UK
articles.description: Mr Stephens is a longtime Republican donor who reportedly gave to conservative groups that opposed Trump in 2016 but then supported him in the 2020 and 2024 races.
articles.content:
US President-elect Donald Trump has nominated billionaire investment banker Warren Stephens to be his ambassador to the UK.
Mr Trump made the announcement in a post on social media, calling him "one of the most successful businessmen in the country".... [1687 chars]

articles.description: Prominent anchor Rachel Maddow takes a salary hit as MSNBC grapples with a drop in ratings post Trump's win.
articles.content:

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: California Braces for Legal Showdowns with Upcoming Trump Administration
articles.description: California Governor Gavin Newsom is pursuing up to $25 million in additional legal funding to challenge anticipated federal actions under President-elect Donald Trump's second term. This fund aims to protect key state interests, including reproductive rights, environmental standards, and civil rights, while also recouping essential federal funds.
articles.content: In a strategic move to counter the anticipated policy shifts from U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's approaching administration, California's Democratic Governor Gavin Newsom has announced a request for up to $25 million in supplementary legal fundi... [568 chars]

articles.title: California Democrats open special session to Trump-proof state priorities
articles.description: Gov. Newsom called a special session to prepare $25 million for legal battles with the incoming Trump administration. Republicans dismiss the session as a political stunt.
articles.content:
California lawmakers kicked off a special session of the state Legislature on Monday. The reason? To fund a $25 million war chest for anticipated legal battles with incoming President Donald Trump’s administration.

articles.title: Trump picks Republican mega-donor Warren Stephens as ambassador to UK
articles.description: Investment banker has donated regularly to conservative causes although not always in favor of the president-elect
articles.content:
Donald Trump announced on Monday he has picked investment banker and Republican mega-donor Warren Stephens to serve as ambassador to the UK.
